data.text: Please wait for the roles to be assigned

data.message: **Welcome to the GolmiEval Task!** Describe the highlighted piece on the board on the right so that another person could **uniquely** identify it.
If you're not sure which piece is the target, just click on it! If that's your target, I'll tell you so.
Once you're ready you can simply send your description with the chat on the bottom. You will see a total of 15 boards
Here's a little help: you can reference pieces according to this legend
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
That is your target
The upmost red piece of form P
The lower one of the cluster of red V pieces
The piece of form Z in the middle of a cluster of three green Z and P pieces to the right of the box
The left of two brown Y pieces in the lower right corner
The brown L piece in the upper right corner
Still 10 boards to go
The midnight blue Y piece in the upper right corner of the box
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
The olive-coloured piece of form U right in the middle of the box
The rightmost teal X piece in the lower half of the box
The purple V piece in the center of the upper part of the box. It is to the left of another purple-coloured V piece.
The brown piece of form Y on the lower left corner
Still 5 boards to go. You almost made it!
The purple W piece in the center of the upper part of the box. It is to the right of another purple W piece.
The rightmost midnight blue X piece which is closest to the lower part of the box
The midnight blue F piece in the lower left corner
The lower one of the royal blue W pieces in the center of the box
The grey W piece in the center of the right half of the box. Below is another cluster of grey W pieces.
That was the last one, thank you very much for your help
The room is closing, thanky you for plaing
The room is closing, thanky you for plaing
